title: Adjust relationship start date so live counter renders 64 days

requirements.summary: Update the configured relationship start date constant so the live Days Since counter currently shows 64 without hard-coding the value.
acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/valentine/config.ts, RELATIONSHIP_START_DATE is updated to the correct date such that the counter currently renders 64 in the UI.
The DaysSinceCounter component continues to compute and render the value from RELATIONSHIP_START_DATE (no hard-coded '64' in the component).
The section still displays the exact label text: "Days Since Our Story Began" and the suffix "days of love" with correct singular/plural behavior.

file_operations.description: Change RELATIONSHIP_START_DATE to the correct date (64 days prior to today) so the existing DaysSinceCounter live calculation renders 64, while keeping the value derived from this single configurable constant.
